112.title: All Winners Comics
notes:
Anthology style comic book. Features include
  • All Winners Squad (issues 19, 21)
  • The Angel (issue 1)
  • Black Avenger (issue 6)
  • Black Marvel (issue 1)
  • Captain America (issues 1-18)
  • The Destroyer (issues 2-12)
  • Human Torch (issues 1-13, 17-18)
  • Sub-Mariner (issues 1-18)
  • Whizzer (issues 2-5, 7-11, 13-18)
This list originates from the one in Howard Keltner's Index to Golden Age Comic Books (Detroit, Mich. : J. Bails, 1976)
